message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.CY, cs.SY, cs.GT

This paper deals with the privacy and concurrency issues in payment channel networks, which are relevant to several sub-fields of computer science. The most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) as the paper focuses on privacy concerns and presents provably secure solutions. The second likely category is cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) as the paper deals with off-chain payment channels and their combination in a network. The third likely category is cs.CY (Computers and Society) as the paper discusses the implications of the deployment of PCNs in practice. The fourth likely category is cs.SY (Systems and Control) as the paper presents protocols for PCNs. The fifth likely category is cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory) as the paper discusses race conditions and deadlocks, which are relevant to game theory.
